snippet: “Having people with genuine interests in obscure or overlooked areas” works best, said the organizer of the “Boring Conference,” in London.
abstract: Boring Conference, series of talks on tedious subjects held in London, sells out.
lead_paragraph: “Having people with genuine interests in obscure or overlooked areas” works best, said the organizer of the “Boring Conference,” in London.

headline.main: At ‘Boring’ Event: Lamppost History and Puzzle-Assembling
